Item.Title: Introduce yourself?
Item.Data: Name, age, education, job history, current technical stack.

Item.Title: What’s your salary expectations?
Item.Data: Search about salary ranges in the job country.

Item.Title: What do you know about our company?
Please tell us about the situation, when you showed your leadership?
Please tell about the situation, when you had a conflict and how you resolved it?
Item.Data: Listen for everyone involved, friendly discussions and motivation.

Item.Title: Why do you want to relocate joining our company?
What do you know about the country you applied for?
What is your preference of technologies (the ideal technology) you want to work with?
Item.Data: Talk about current and preferred technical stack

Item.Title: What are your strengths and weaknesses?
Item.Data: Strength: never stop until I got my task finished. Weakness: sometimes I forget something I should do and I’m working on this issue by using a TODO list and do workouts.

Item.Title: What is your technology wish list?
Tell me about any achievement?
Item.Data: Talk about NBE with 6 junior developers.
